text: Miranda de Ebro is a city in Spain. It is the second biggest city in Burgos province, in the region of Castile and León. It is an important industrial center, with a population of 39,589 people (2009). The river which runs through the city is the Ebro. ==Other websites== * Official Website Category:Province of Burgos Category:Municipalities in Castile and León
title: Miranda de Ebro
